name: user-weather-monorepo
description: User Weather CRUD application with Node.js API and React frontend

scripts.build: pnpm --filter shared build && pnpm --filter api build && pnpm --filter frontend build
scripts.test: pnpm --filter shared test && pnpm --filter api test && pnpm --filter frontend test
scripts.lint: pnpm --filter shared lint && pnpm --filter api lint && pnpm --filter frontend lint
scripts.clean: pnpm --filter shared clean && pnpm --filter api clean && pnpm --filter frontend clean
